This is an [R Markdown](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com) Notebook. When you execute code within the notebook, the results appear beneath the code. 

Try executing this chunk by clicking the *Run* button within the chunk or by placing your cursor inside it and pressing *Cmd+Shift+Enter*. 

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
batter_data <- read_csv('batter_data.csv')
head(batter_data)
```
```{r}
batter_old <- batter_data %>%
  filter(age>=32)
batter_old$PA = as.numeric(batter_old$PA)
batter_old$OPS_plus = as.numeric(batter_old$OPS_plus)
batter_old <- batter_old %>%
  filter(PA>250) %>%
  filter(pitcher=='N') %>%
  filter(year_ID>1950) %>%
  select(name_common, mlb_ID, PA, OPS_plus, age)
batter_old_mean <- batter_old %>%
  group_by(mlb_ID) %>%
  summarize(PA_mean_old=mean(PA), OPS_plus_mean_old=mean(OPS_plus))
head(batter_old)
head(batter_old_mean)
```
```{r}
batter_young <- batter_data %>%
  filter(age<32)
batter_young$PA = as.numeric(batter_young$PA)
batter_young$OPS_plus = as.numeric(batter_young$OPS_plus)
batter_young <- batter_young %>%
  filter(PA>250) %>%
  filter(pitcher=='N') %>%
  filter(year_ID>1950) %>%
  select(name_common, mlb_ID, PA, OPS_plus, age)
batter_young_mean <- batter_young %>%
  group_by(mlb_ID) %>%
  summarize(PA_mean_young=mean(PA), OPS_plus_mean_young=mean(OPS_plus))
head(batter_young)
head(batter_young_mean)
```
```{r}
batter_combined <- batter_data %>%
  merge(batter_young_mean, type='inner') %>%
  merge(batter_old_mean, type='inner') %>%
  group_by(mlb_ID) %>%
  summarize(PA_mean_young=mean(PA_mean_young), OPS_plus_mean_young=mean(OPS_plus_mean_young), PA_mean_old=mean(PA_mean_old), OPS_plus_mean_old=mean(OPS_plus_mean_old))
batter_combined
```
```{r}
selection <- batter_combined %>%
  filter(OPS_plus_mean_old>OPS_plus_mean_young)
selection
ID_list <- selection$mlb_ID
```
```{r}
selection_full <- batter_data[batter_data$mlb_ID %in% ID_list,]
selection_full
```
